title: REMAKE

replies.body:
The way the [/Remake system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) works is that it gets triggered when someone is inactive for 90 seconds or more during the first 3 minutes. It seems this player skirted the system, but will still be picked up by both the automated [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) and any reports they received. 

While it really sucks in the moment, I can assure you that players who continue to exhibit this type of behavior **will** see justice on the rift. Please let me know if you have any questions.
no mroe question ty for the answear and keep helping the comunity.
